name: Writing Table (bureau plat)
description: Writing Table (bureau plat); Attributed to Joseph Baumhauer (French, died 1772); Paris, France; about 1745 - 1749; Oak and ash veneered with bloodwood on oak carcass; gilt bronze mounts; modern leather top; 78.9 x 181.3 x 100.6 cm (31 1/16 x 71 3/8 x 39 5/8 in.); 71.DA.95; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Writing Table (bureau plat)
